title: Complaint filed against Anis Alamgir, Shaon, 2 others under Anti-Terrorism Act
body: A complaint has been filed against journalist Anis Alamgir, actress Meher Afroz Shaon, and two others under the Anti-Terrorism Act. Arian Ahmed, a central organiser of the July Revolutionary Alliance, lodged the complaint with the Uttara West Police Station early today. The two other named in the complaint are model Maria Kispotta and media personality Imtu Ratish Imtiaz. Confirming the matter, Kazi Mohammad Rafiq Ahmed, officer-in-charge of Uttara West Police Station, told The Daily Star that the complaint relates to a cyber issue. "After consulting with senior officials, the next course of action will be decided," he said. Anis Alamgir is currently at the Detective Branch (DB) office of the Dhaka Metropolitan Police (DMP).
